text: Robin Schulz (born 28 April 1987 in Osnabrück) is a German DJ and record producer. In 2014, he released the first single from his debut album, a remix of "Waves" by Mr. Probz. Schulz released a remix of the song "Prayer in C" by Lilly Wood and the Prick in 2014, which topped the charts in over 20 countries. == Discography == * Prayer (2014) * Sugar (2015) * Uncovered (2017) * IIII (2021) * Pink (2023) Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:German DJs Category:German record producers Category:Entertainers from Lower Saxony Category:People from Osnabrück
title: Robin Schulz
